body_html:
cannot open git-upload-pack seems to happen when the host name in the remote= attribute of git_repository cannot be resolved. Try running git clone with the URI mentioned in the offending git_repository rule. My hunch is that it won't work, and then it's a network misconfiguration (also make sure there is no sandboxing, firewalls or whatever in the way)

Bazel could be more explicit about it, though.

body:
`cannot open git-upload-pack` seems to happen when the host name in the `remote=` attribute of `git_repository` cannot be resolved. Try running `git clone` with the URI mentioned in the offending `git_repository` rule. My hunch is that it won't work, and then it's a network misconfiguration (also make sure there is no sandboxing, firewalls or whatever in the way)

Bazel could be more explicit about it, though.
